description:
A tool for setting the artwork of your Steam library.


New Features
- added ability to apply original assets (e290096)
- added ability to view original assets (7294afe)
- added logo position editing back (c225e56)
- added the ability to show previously selected grids (20d44ab)
Bug Fixes
- corrected issues loading appinfo games and uploading local grids (a6f8baf)
- current grids now appear for non-steam games (e02852e)
- searching now works as expected (5d725fe)
- snackbars are no longer blocking (8073561)
- specified a non-generic package name for the backend (23ff9fb)
- steam api games now load properly (f80840c)
